overview: Over the past 20 years, Mitch has advised more than 60 companies, both large and small, on their most strategic issues including the optimization of their business operations, marketing investments and digital assets. Prior to co-founding Noofangle Media, Mitch served as a Vice President at Booz Allen Hamilton, where he worked with Fortune 500 companies in the consumer products and media industries. He held numerous leadership positions within the firm including Managing Partner of the Dallas office and leader of the firmâ€™s IT Strategy Service Offering. Before joining Booz Allen, he was a consultant with Andersen Consulting, now Accenture. He earned a mechanical engineering degree from Southern Methodist University and an MBA in general management from the Harvard School of Business. Mitch has served on the board of numerous companies as well as the Information Technology Association of America.
